thread.section_title: Commodities Market News - Yahoo!7 Australia Finance
thread.title: Midstates Petroleum reports 2Q loss

title: Midstates Petroleum reports 2Q loss
text:
Wed, Aug 5, 2015, 11:54 PM AEST - Australia Markets closed Midstates Petroleum reports 2Q loss Midstates Petroleum reports 2nd-quarter loss of $598.4 million Associated Press â€“ 23 minutes ago Recommend 2.85 +0.18 
TULSA, Okla. (AP) _ Midstates Petroleum Co. (MPO) on Tuesday reported a loss of $598.4 million in its second quarter. 
The Tulsa, Oklahoma-based company said it had a loss of $88.44 per share. Losses, adjusted for asset impairment costs and non-recurring costs, came to 58 cents per share. 
The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 10 cents per share. 
The oil exploration and production company posted revenue of $74.8 million in the period, which also did not meet Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $134.4 million. 
The company's shares closed at $2.67. A year ago, they were trading at $5.78.
